name: ghost-kraken
description: Kraken tests for Ghost 3.41.1 local instance

scripts.kk-test: npm run gh-in && kraken-node run && npm run gh-un || npm run gh-un && rm -rf reports/ .kraken
scripts.gh-in: ghost install 3.41.1 --local --force -d ghost-local && ghost config port 2368 -d ghost-local && ghost restart -d ghost-local
scripts.gh-un: ghost stop --no-setup-linux-user -d ghost-local && ghost uninstall --no-prompt --force -d ghost-local && rm -rf ghost-local
scripts.cy-headed: npm run gh-in && cypress run --headed && npm run gh-un || npm run gh-un
scripts.cy-headless: npm run gh-in && cypress run --headless && npm run gh-un || npm run gh-un

author: Luis Miguel Guzman Perez
